string-array.name: general_university
string-array.item: Jatiya Kabi Kazi Nazrul Islam University

resources.string:
The University of Dhaka, commonly referred to as Dhaka University or DU, is the oldest and largest university in Bangladesh. It was established in 1921 during the British colonial period and has since become a prestigious institution of higher education in the country.
